game.name: Turbo Shell
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Turbo Shell is a fast-paced precision platformer where, instead of running and jumping, you push and pull yourself to get ahead at high-speed. The more skilfully you master this unique mechanic, the quicker you’ll conquer ever more challenging levels - and reach your goal in record time.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Turbo Shell is a fast-paced precision platformer where, instead of running and jumping, you push and pull yourself to get ahead at high-speed. The more skilfully you master this unique mechanic, the quicker you’ll conquer ever more challenging levels - and reach your goal in record time.

reviewHighlights.text: I got the game as a gift from a good friend and I liked it right away. The game is a fast platformer with very cute animations. The levels get more an...
A fun game, well worth the money and time. You are an egg hero trying to rescue all the eggyolks in many short levels without becoming scrambled eggs...
